name: Tribute to Ac/Dc & Guns N' Roses by 2blue
about: Join us at Hard Rock Cafe for The Ultimate Tribute to AC/DC & Guns N’ Roses featuring the incredible 2Blue. With a powerful four-octave voice and captivating storytelling, Tirthankar Poddar brings nostalgia and energy to the stage. This is a must-see for anyone who grew up with classic rock—come and relive those unforgettable moments with someone special.

address.streetAddress: Unit G-25 & 26, Ground Floor, Park Square Mall International Tech Park, Bangalore, Pattandur Agrahara

name: Suit & Panda Live at Zozo Club | Bangalore  | Ny2025
about: Get ready for an unforgettable night as Suit and Panda take over on December 28th! Experience electrifying beats and unstoppable energy that will keep you dancing all night long. Use code EXPERTSP100 for Rs. 100 off your passes, but act fast—spots are limited!

address.streetAddress: A-1, D Rajgopala, nagar, Sanjay Nagar Main Rd, Krishnamurthy Extension, Naidu Layout, Raj Mahal Vilas 2nd Stage, Sanjayanagara

name: NOVAK Live in Bangalore by Souldout | Pandora Experiences | Lost Exit
about: Experience a night of electrifying beats and infectious rhythms with Novak, the viral sensation DJ/Producer renowned for his mastery in Afrohouse and House music, at One8 Commune in Bengaluru on December 20th.

address.streetAddress: One 8 Commune 10/5, 6th floor, Rathnam's Complex, Kasturba Road, Mahatma Gandhi Rd, Shanthala Nagar, Ashok Nagar, Bengaluru, Karnataka 560001, India

name: Artbat Live in Delhi | Christmas Day
about: Join us for an unforgettable ARTBAT concert in New Delhi, featuring the dynamic duo from Kyiv, Artur and Batish. Renowned for their unique sound and impressive accolades, including Mixmag Stars of the Year and Beatport's Number 1 best-selling artists, this is a night you won't want to miss. Experience the energy and passion that has made ARTBAT a standout force in the electronic music scene.

name: Catharsis Vol. 05
about: Experience the vibrant energy of CATHARSIS - Vol. 5, Bangalore's premier gig series celebrating original music across diverse genres. From folk to metal, this festival showcases talented artists like Sharmila Joshi and Badal Kashyap, offering a unique opportunity to support the local music scene while enjoying an unforgettable night of creativity and passion.

address.streetAddress: 1st floor of Gillys redefined,# 413, 100 Feet Road,, 4th Block, Koramangala, KHB Block Koramangala, Koramangala 4-B Block, 5th Block, Koramangala, Bengaluru, Karnataka 560034, India

name: Massano Live at Sunburn Union
about: Don't miss out on the electrifying performance by Massano Live in Bangalore! With a unique blend of aggressive sound design and hypnotic melodies, Massano has quickly become one of the biggest breakout stars in the music scene. From topping the Beatport charts to performing at renowned venues like Tomorrowland and Ultra, Massano's dynamic music is sure to leave you in awe.

address.streetAddress: Passport Office, Mantri Avenue, Next to Koramangala, KHB Games Village, Koramangala, Bengaluru, Karnataka 560047, India

name: Masquerade Christmas Ft. Innam at Kitty Ko Bangalore.
about: Get ready, Bengaluru, for the ultimate Pre-Christmas Bash: Masquerade Christmas! Join us on Friday, December 20th, at Kitty Ko for an enchanting night featuring INNAM from Ukraine and ARTBLOTKISH. Experience the best production, top artists, and incredible music starting at 7 PM.

address.streetAddress: The Lalit Ashok, Kumara Krupa Road, Highgrounds, Seshadripuram

name: Cristoph (Anjunadeep) at Raahi Bengaluru
about: Get ready, Bangalore! On Sunday, December 22nd, the progressive house legend Cristoph is back for an exclusive Darkroom Edition at Raahi Bangalore. Experience his signature atmospheric sounds live—grab your tickets now on Insider and don't miss this chance to see a global icon perform!

address.streetAddress: 15, State Bank of India Rd, Shanthala Nagar, Ashok Nagar

name: Gini | Cozy India Tour | Bengaluru
about: Join us for an unforgettable evening with Gini, a talented singer-songwriter from Dehradun. Her soulful sound and heartfelt lyrics will take you on an emotional journey, creating a cozy yet powerful atmosphere. Experience a performance that embodies warmth, hope, and courage at The Hub Bengaluru.

address.streetAddress: Safina Plaza, 84/85, Infantry Rd, Tasker Town, Shivaji Nagar, Bengaluru, Karnataka 560001, India

organizer.name: Firstwav Music and Media Pvt. Ltd.

name: Blackstratblues Live | Bangalore
about: Join Blackstratblues for an unforgettable night of music, led by the talented Warren Mendonsa. Experience their unique blend of Blues, Rock, and 70's Psychedelia, featuring captivating melodies and electronic influences. With a history of sharing the stage with legends and chart-topping releases, this is a performance you won't want to miss.

name: Social Presents Members only Ft Donatello & Dj Kay || #churchstreetsocial  | Iehpl
about: Join us for Members Only at SOCIAL, featuring Donatello and DJ Kay, where the vibes are electric and the music is non-stop. This 21+ event promises an unforgettable night, so make sure to bring your ID and leave any illegal substances at home. Your tickets are fully redeemable at the venue, ensuring a hassle-free experience.

address.streetAddress: 46/1, Cobalt, Church St, Haridevpur, Shanthala Nagar, Ashok Nagar

name: Lollapalooza India 2025
about: Get ready, Mumbai! Lollapalooza India is back for its third edition on March 8-9, 2025. Featuring over 30 iconic artists across various genres like pop, rock, indie, hip-hop, and more, including headliners such as Green Day, Shawn Mendes, and Zedd. Join the ultimate music festival experience with amazing performances, food, beverages, and brand activations. Don't miss out on this two-day extravaganza celebrating live music and culture!

name: Jingle Jam Ft. Rohit Barker & Shiva Manvi at Gawky Goose
about: This Christmas, join us for the ultimate Jingle Jam featuring Rohith Barker and Shiva Manvi at the premium venue Gawky Goose. Gates open at 9:00 PM onwards. Don’t miss the festive vibes and groovy beats this Christmas at Gawky Goose on Wind Tunnel Road, brought to you by Hypervibez. See you there!

address.streetAddress: #77, Wind Tunnel Rd, Muniyappa Layout, Murgesh Pallya
